description: A 60% government contribution is set to fall to 20% by next year, following States approval.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey payroll scheme due to be extended until March 2021
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey payroll scheme due to be extended until March 2021 - BBC News
maintext: Businesses will also be able to claim for new employees under phase three if they are entitled to work, or can hire people who have Registered status if they were on any payroll in March.
